column5: Our 3 bedroom, 2 bath, GROUND FLOOR BEACHFRONT condo is just steps to the Beach with stunning views and access to the Beach and Gulf of Mexico. The condo is GROUND FLOOR WALKOUT to the beach with unbelievable views! No messing around with elevators from higher floors...just walk a few steps out the patio door and you are on the beach!!! Imagine a place where you can wake up and walk right out on the Beach....PURE PERFECTION!!!
